```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
options(scipen = 999)
```

```{r}
all_sale_li <- readRDS("../data/all_sale_li.rds")
```

```{r}
ggplot(all_sale_li, aes(x=dist, y=amount)) + geom_point(color = "orange") + theme_bw() + ggtitle("Home Sales Amounts by Distance from Low Income Development") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + xlab("Distance") + ylab("Home Sales Amount") + scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 10, 1), limits=c(0, 10))
```
